bugDescription: Minor UI bug causing misalignment of elements on the homepage.
The application slows down significantly when more than 100 items are added to the cart.
A security vulnerability was found in the user login module that could potentially allow unauthorized access.
The application uses a deprecated API for the payment gateway.
A bug in the data synchronization module causes outdated data to be displayed.
A bug in the payment gateway causes transactions to fail intermittently.
Items added to the shopping cart disappear after a few minutes.
The order tracking system shows incorrect status for some orders.
Some users have reported difficulty in navigating the user interface.
Some pages take a long time to load, causing a poor user experience.
The application fails to connect to the database intermittently.
Some products do not appear in the product listing page.
New users are unable to register due to a validation error.
The application performance needs to be improved for better user experience.
Incorrect data is displayed on the user profile page.
The search functionality returns incorrect results.
Users are not receiving email notifications.
The data backup process fails intermittently.
The user interface needs to be updated for better accessibility.
A bug causing data loss when updating user profiles.
